page.title: 12A CARE CENTRE
page.content: Yew Tree Lodge was opened in April 1985.It is very comfortable and relaxing inside.It provides short stay residential care for 24 severely physically disabled adults of either sex between the ages of 18 and 64 who require a higher level of care than is normally possible in local authority homes.The purpose built accomodation is equipped to a very high standard with 24 bedrooms,a therapy department,a large dining room,an inner garden and many other rooms.Altogether there are approximately 7O rooms.
